当前版本：2.21.1.30 这套自定义瞄具原作者是醉饭 由于长时间没有更新 本人只是帮忙更新一下并对其优化 。【这套瞄具的制作经过原作者同意】 由于新版本部分顶级载具的瞄具刻度尺有所改变 我也作出了一定部分的优化。【如果有任何问题可以向我反馈 邮箱:1745097470@qq.com】 此瞄具严禁用于任何商业用途 转载请说明出处 祝各位游戏愉快.


Current version: 2.21.1.30 the original author of this set of custom sight is Zui fan. I just help update and optimize it because I haven't updated it for a long time. [the production of this set of sight is approved by the original author] as the sight scales of some top vehicles in the new version have changed, I have also made some optimization. [if you have any questions, please contact me at: 1745097470@qq.com ...

Rick & Morty custom sight for all tanks!
ANOTEHR low effort joke due to season 6 premiere (go check it out)
Simply paste the all_tanks folder from .zip to UserSights folder

"-BURP! Morty, this game has over 2000 vehicles, Morty, we-e gotta research them all Morty
-B-but Rick! What about our season 6 premiere?
-Shut Morty, BURP, I'm playing top tier USA iiiin m22 Locust dammit f*ck KA-50 Morty... "


Enjoy!

Here it is, finally. The YouTube video nearly has 100k views and I am starting to feel bad. Learn the pattern in the top half of the sight then remember every kink of the corresponding line is 250m distance! Good luck!

Enhanced Tank Sight

This is an universal tank sight meant to replace the unpractical and obscuring default sight grid. After a few months of testing and upgrading I've came up with this design. It was created with the main goal of giving maximum visibility while having practical features for every situation.

Main features:
- Distinct aiming point for quicker target lineup,
- Thickened horizontal line endings for center recognition during intense action and closeup shooting,
- Range indicators located close to the center increasing transparency,
- Toggleable green illumi...
